- [ ] Bump the version number in `setup.py`
- [ ] Compile static assets
- [ ] Lint all files
- [ ] Pass all tests
- [ ] Code Reviewer #1
- [ ] Code Reviewer #2
- [ ] Does this need uploaded to PyPi?
- [ ] Do we need a PR against `edx-platform` to bump the version?
